findings.title: Non ERC20-Compliance Of Transfer Event
findings.description: In the `mint()` function of `BEP20TokenContract`, the `Transfer` event is emitted with the contract itself as the `_from` address instead of `0x0` when tokens are created, which is not compliant with the ERC20 standard.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: Privileged `owner` account has critical role in governing and regulating token-related operations with functions like `mint()`, `lockToken()`, and `setICO()`.

findings.title: isVestedlisted Logic Bypass Via transferFrom()
findings.description: The vestedlist feature can be bypassed by accounts in vestedlist through non-vestedlist accounts by calling approve(), followed by transferFrom().
